pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, February 26, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

    • Ministers will be available to media in the third floor foyer of West Block as of 12:00 p.m.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister, Minister of Science and Sport Kirsty Duncan, and Leader of the Government in the House of Commons Bardish Chagger, will join Dr. Donna Strickland as she presents a demonstration to National Capital Region students.

Room 215A
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

    • Photo opportunity
